Directives > ui-blank-state

Blank State Message Default

You do not have any projects in which you participate.
Create your first one! 

<ui-blank-state>
    You do not have any projects in which you participate.<br/>
    <span class="ui-blank-state-action">Create</span> your first one!
</ui-blank-state>

Blank State Message Custom

You do not have any projects in which you participate.
Create your first one! 

<ui-blank-state message-width="400px" background-color="#FFFCB6">
    You do not have any projects in which you participate.<br/>
    <span class="ui-blank-state-action">Create</span> your first one!
</ui-blank-state>

ui-blank-state Options

Name type description
message-width string The width of the message box to be generated. Defaults to 650px if not supplied.
background-color string The background color of the message box rendered. Defaults to @Porcelain-500 if not supplied.
